name: auth-fb-api
author: Oleks Chemerys
description: Boilerplate for Authentication and Roles Authorization based on Firebase Functions.

scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.shell: npm run build && env NODE_ENV=stage firebase functions:shell
scripts.deploy: npm run env && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.env: test -f env.prod.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.prod.json)" || echo "Please add the file env.prod.json before deploy"
